wifiStrings.Instructions.SlideA.titleCop.translation: To connect to Cozmo you'll need to go to your device's WiFi settings

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide0.translation:
Step 1:
Find and tap on your device's Settings icon

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide1.translation:
Step 2:
Select the WiFi section from your Settings menu

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide2.translation:
Step 3:
Choose Cozmo's network from the list.

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide3.translation:
Step 4:
Enter the WiFi password shown on your Cozmo.
Use ALL CAPS!

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide3.altCopy.translation:
DONâ€™T SEE A PASSWORD?
TAP 'GET HELP'

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide4.translation:
Step 5:
Exit Settings and tap on your Cozmo app

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide0.viewAll.translation: Swipe to read all the instructions first!

wifi.gethelp.description.translation:
Try the following:
1. Turn your device's WiFi OFF then back ON
2. Remove then place Cozmo on his charger
3. Raise & Lower Cozmo's lift to see his
WiFi Network Info
